entry.title: WIND WARNING, Victoria Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:35 a.m. PDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near Haro Strait this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near Haro Strait early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023
